snippet: Are C.E.O.'s overpaid? A majority of corporate directors appear to think that is the case in other companies. But most directors think their own boards are doing just fine, Floyd Norris writes on his blog.

headline.main: We Do It Right, but Those Others Don't

abstract: Are C.E.O.'s overpaid? A majority of corporate directors appear to think that is the case in other companies. But most directors think their own boards are doing just fine, Floyd Norris writes on his blog.
